agency_desc: A faith-based, nonprofit organization that provides numerous assistance programs to meet human needs, including financial assistance.
service_description: Provides limited financial assistance for gasoline, utilities, food vouchers, and non-narcotic prescription expenses for eligible persons. Households may receive assistance once per year, based on funding and individual assessment. Meeting locations are scheduled.
site_details: Call to leave a message; provide contact information to receive a call back from staff. Appointments will be scheduled at a public location.
site_eligibility: Open -- Not received assistance within the past 12 months -- For utilities, must be pending disconnection
